abstract: Comcast is valuing NBCUniversal at about nine times earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization, assuming growth continues at a similar pace, roughly where Barclays analysts peg Disney.
snippet: Comcast is valuing NBCUniversal at about nine times earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization, assuming growth continues at a similar pace, roughly where Barclays analysts peg Disney.
lead_paragraph: Comcast has smartly ad-libbed on an already winning script. Back in 2009, the cable operator engineered a complex, multistep deal with General Electric to buy NBCUniversal.
